subject: NCAA Lacrosse Championships
College Athletics
Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Colin Briggs and Chris Bocklet scored two goals each, and host Virginia (12-3), last year’s champion, won by 6-5 against Princeton (11-5) in the first round of the N.C.A.A. men’s tournament.
snippet: Colin Briggs and Chris Bocklet scored two goals each, and host Virginia (12-3), last year’s champion, won by 6-5 against Princeton (11-5) in the first round of the N.C.A.A. men’s tournament.
